page.title: 16The County Show
page.content: {The County Show}is held once a year, usually in{August,}on the edge of Withybush Airfield; walkers/cars/buses form long queues....waiting to get in. A famous or High-Ranking{PERSONAGE {declares The Show to be " OPEN ". This is primarily an{AGRICULTURAL show, and lasts for{three days.}During this time there is the{Judging}of livestock, show_jumping, horse trials and a dog show, going on{in two Rings, so that the judging and events can take place at the same time. One of the hangers is used by{cattle and for{auctioning.}Another hanger is for{stalls to sell items}&{to display {work equipment;}things like Police, Army, Banks and Safety in the Home are also{'on show'}in-side & out-side. There is always a{novelty event _ Daredevil Riders;Coach & Horses Teams. Newspapers print{Special Show Pages.
